member.name: T:Mossywell.WebUtils
member.summary: A set of static utlities relating to the Internet.

member.name: M:Mossywell.WebUtils.GetURI(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a URI and returns the response as a string. Note that: 1. The caller must handle any exceptions, which generally occur when the request is being got and when the stream reader is reading the response. 2. Keepalives are set to false. 3. If a redirection took place (that is, the URI requested was not the one that was returned), an empty string is returned.
member.param: The URI that identifies the Internet resource
The length of time, in milliseconds, until the request times out, or the value Timeout.Infinite to indicate that the request does not time out.
